GiveHub unifies donor and volunteer management, helping nonprofits plan campaigns, monitor resource flow, and generate transparent impact reports from one centralized dashboard.

The solution would improve volunteer retention by 25%, enhance donation tracking accuracy by 40%, and enable real-time transparency for stakeholders and donors.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many nonprofits struggle to effectively coordinate volunteers and manage donations because they rely on multiple disconnected tools and manual record-keeping. This fragmentation leads to poor visibility into resource allocation, volunteer performance, and donor engagement, making it difficult to build sustained relationships, optimize fundraising efforts, and measure overall program impact.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A ServiceNow-based application that integrates volunteer scheduling, donation tracking, and impact visualization through dynamic dashboards and automated reminders.

The solution would incorporate Customer Service Management (CSM) for user interactions, Flow Designer to automate campaign workflows, and Performance Analytics to visualize donation and volunteer data.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

It would integrate with payment gateways like Paystack or Stripe for secure donations, email/SMS APIs for communication, and data visualization modules for impact reporting.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Key challenges include ensuring system compatibility with existing NGO databases, securing payment transactions, and preventing donor fatigue through personalized engagement strategies.
